auth.name: Name
auth.msgInvalidName: Please enter a name at least 6 character and contain At least one uppercase, one lower case.
auth.msgErrPassword: Please enter a password at least 8 character and contain At least one uppercase, one lower case, one digit.

discord.title: Easy Learn in Discord
discord.desc: Join the Lonely Zoo discord server to learn & have fun together. Besides, make new friends and exchange, exchange with each other

facebook.title: Easy Learn on Facebook
facebook.desc: Follow EasyLearn & Lonely Zoo's facebook page for more interesting information about learning & entertainment

youtube.title: Easy Learn with Youtube
youtube.desc: Subscribe to Easy Learn's Youtube channel to follow the courses posted on it

creator.title: EasyLearn Creator
creator.decs: Become a collaborator with EasyLearn and share your knowledge with everyone
creator.ben1: Become a partner with Easy Learn
creator.ben4: Make money with your own content

experience.title: Experience
experience.desc: Let everyone know you have experience in your field
experience.notHaveExp: You have no information about your experience

education.title: Education
education.desc: Let everyone know where you used to study
education.descEdu: Briefly describe what you have learned
education.notHaveEdu: You have no information about your education

changeImg.title: Change your image course
changeImg.desc: Change your course image. If you continue without changing, the current image will serve as the main profile picture for your course.

myStuff.title: Manage your content
myStuff.desc: View content that you have created such as videos, blogs

serverErr.title: SERVER ERROR!
serverErr.desc: Error 500: Something is wrong on the server. EasyLearn apologize for this inconvenience
